amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 107 of the bill, which prohibits the use of funds to implement regulations pertaining to the definition of waters under the jurisdiction of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 107 of the bill which prohibits the use of funds to implement regulations pertaining to the definition of waters under the jurisdiction of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 236 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 236 (Roll no. 311).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Moran.
